snippet: Zynga said on Wednesday that it planned to sell additional shares, three months after the social game giant went public, to let some investors trim their holdings.
abstract: Zynga said on Wednesday that it planned to sell additional shares, three months after the social game giant went public, to let some investors trim their holdings.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Zynga Plans to Sell $400 Million of Shares
